website_summaries.verdict: Loaded with AMD's new flagship Ryzen 7 1800X CPU, the CyberPower Gamer Master Ultra is a compelling fusion of gaming and processing performance at a delectable price.
pros: Outstanding performance, particularly on multithreaded workloads
cons: Other desktops offer superior raw gaming performance

customer_reviews.title: Very very poor and terrible customer support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gaming pc but unlucky the front audio jack is not working, so tried to call the customer support and get some assistance to fix this issue. But, the frustration starts only hear; every time you call it will go to voice mail and if someone picked up and they will tell you they are going to forward you but again that will go to voice mail. So, I wasted two days and given up. I have looked in to the search engine most of them are complained the same issue. I have decided to return the pc
customer_reviews.author: Vinoth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to recieving this PC but when it came was very disappointed to find that there was no 32 GB of ram , not a single stick. The RTX2080 graphics card was missing and also the 500GB m.2 SSD. Like what the hell Cyberpower do you not check your systems before shipping them out
customer_reviews.author: CryptOo

customer_reviews.title: Truly awesome machine, tremendous performance
customer_reviews.text: Truly awesome machine, tremendous performance. Running all my games on Ultra setting and it shrugs them off like, come on dude give me something difficult to do lol. Built well, very heavy case due to the all glass panels I guess, also bigger than I expected, lights up like a Christmas tree. Getting used to that but would have been just as happy with a "normal" case. This is a very extravert PC but it has good reason to show off. Super happy with it so far, recommend it to anyone who wants a real top end PC.
customer_reviews.author: Kysumu

customer_reviews.title: WOW what a machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cyberpowerPC Ultra Luxe 1080Ti RGB Gaming PC - Intel Core i7-8700K, Nvidia GTX 1080Ti 11GB, 32GB RAM, Z370 C yesterday and can only say how impressive this computer is for gaming. The staff at cyberpower are very helpfull and allowed me to get an upgrade with out any hesitation on the day they were sending the computer out. I play an online game and the settings are very high, that is np for this machine. I would recommend this machine even though it is early days of my using it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: faulty hardware in a 2500 pounds worth device, terrible. Update, after only a month the build failed again and it was due to the CPU and they wouldn't replace it, very disappointing, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: 100% would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great PC, very easy to set up, instructions were very clear. Will run any game i throw at it in 4k ultra settings. Wifi card isn't very fast, but this wasn't a problem for me as i had a spare ethernet cable. Very fast delivery (mainland uk).
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This PC was very expensive, so I was reluctant to pay £1770 for it. However, it truly was a great buy, as this PC is extremely fast. With the colossal 32 gigs of RAM which I find to be more than enough, the GTX 1080 which is able to run most 4k games at max graphics on at least 45 fps, and the extremely fast processer this computer has been incredible so far! It was very well-packaged and came with all the necessary components such as Wi-Fi antenna etc. I also appreciate how the case is elevated off the ground to avoid overheating. All in all a relatively great priced PC!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... Cyberpower Ultra Luxe 1080Ti PC today and i absolutely love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Got my Cyberpower Ultra Luxe 1080Ti PC today and i absolutely love this thing! They have great customer service and the delivery was quick too. The PC was very well packaged and is very easy to set up. I 100% Recommend Cyberpower for a awesome PC and service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: So so good. Love this pc, better than I hoped for gaming. Top graphics & speed. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. E. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I had a slight issue with the LED lights not being plugged in when I received this PC but it was resolved over the phone with a member of customer service walking me through the connections. Other than that this is a fantastic PC and was great value, bought to replace my 6700k machine which was still reasonable but after using this now feels sloooow. I would 100% recommend this machine (and company) to anyone, absolutely spot on!
customer_reviews.author: kriaze

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product delivered promptly and exactly as described...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this gaming PC. Having suffered with issues with other makes (a company who named them self’s after a fruit) this worked straight out of the box and so far does exactly what we need as a gaming machine. Playing predominantly Fortnite and Forza (4) and works a treat. The lights on the fans do not shine inside the housing due to the cooler but a very nice build, look and feel. I have purchased via Amazon because you can trust them with any issues unlike some high street names. So far fingers crossed this is staying.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Check the PC that is delivered to the spec that was ordered
customer_reviews.text: The PC arrived just within delivery dates as stated, albeit I did have to chase it up as it was ordered on the 14th Dec and was delivered finally on the 27th. Only after a few days did my son notice that the PC only had half the specified RAM fitted, 16Gb and not 32Gb. I contacted the supplier and they did send out the extra missing RAM which we have fitted ourselves and the PC works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen l williams

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Spot
customer_reviews.text: Had this for approx 3 weeks, runs quietly and visually stunning with LED lighting. Very Fast, runs all the games smoothly with sumptuous graphics when I initially powered it up one of the hard drives wasn't being identified, this issues was sorted by their support over the phone immediately. I found cyberpower support to be very good. An excellent value for money buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great PC (early review, updatable)
customer_reviews.text: Great PC: + value for money + superb specification + very fast at all processes + games looks Early days, updatable review - two weeks to arrive as stated for this specification
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and very good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very good. One tiny scratch in the case when arrived but it’s not really noticeable . Very happy with speed and how quiet this machine is. Only thing I’d say would improve would be to offer more upgrades like led lights on ram fan, or extra ram above 32gb etc . But happy
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, better than expected. Id recommend to anybody able to budget this machine. Easy to add additional hard drives which I too recommend for heavy gaming installation for hard core smooth gaming at max performance or appearance. Optionally I'd upgrade the network card as this one isn't 5G as far as I find. Another option is to install a dedicated sound card and possibly a video capture card, but the on board and graphics card capabilities should suffice for a long time yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming pc!
customer_reviews.text: In short, it's a great gaming pc!So far so good! I had to set it up by myself -got there eventually. It arrivwd well packaged and once out of the box looks very impressive! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M

customer_reviews.title: This was a very good experience. We were going on holidays and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good experience. We were going on holidays and the shipping was close so they One day shipped it for my so I could have it. Would 100% reccomend this PC. It runs fast and smooth and is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic setup. its high quality spec and also part an Art piece.. stuning
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic setup. its high quality spec and also part an Art piece when running. Looks amazing, In gaming mode its quite, due to liquid cooling, and produces high frame rates... super value...
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reacher

customer_reviews.title: Super fast quality PC
customer_reviews.text: Super fast PC that doesn't slow down during multiple tasks. Great for top end games and software. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Handles most games with 75-95 FPS on max settings. I tried Minecraft with Shaders 80 FPS average, and handles open world games great. Has 1.81 TB on D: and 930 on C: .No assembly required. Easy setup. Just take the foil out of the PC(Just unscrew the glass) And plug it in. Also It has a remote to change colours and stuff so that's cool. It can also handle most if not all Virtual Reality Systems.10/10, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BANAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Pc
customer_reviews.text: I GOT THIS DREAM PC THIS AFTERNOON ON TIME , I AM SO HAPPY I GOT IT VERY GOOD , IT CAN RUN ANY GAME VERY HIGH FPS ABOUT 140 + -170+ . JUST UNHAPPY COS WAITED TOO LONG TIMES , MORE THAN 2WEEKS . I THINK COS COVID - 19 SO HAPPY TO SHARE IT TO MY FRIENDS
customer_reviews.author: XiangyuLin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Bought from CyberpowerPC 3 years ago. No issues, quick delivery and awesome computer. I couldn’t get near the price anywhere else. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: bumblebee

customer_reviews.title: Great product, ideal for gaming at my level.
customer_reviews.text: Superb PC for gaming, arrived on time, packaged well, good instructions. So far performing well no issues, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy a complete machine if you can assemble it yourself
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is very careful and there are no problems for the time being, so I give CyberpowerUK a good review. (32G RAM is a combination of 4 8G, main board is MSI z390-pro, water cooling is a little small btw)
customer_reviews.author: will ma

customer_reviews.title: very good  PC
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all, delivery before the date that was schedule. Well done protected inside. Something I would like to add is that you will need a Bluetooth USB adapter if you use any Bluetooth device in your new PC, motherboard doesn't have Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Teixeira Cardozo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Delivered perfectly and well packaged, zero problems setting up or running any games. Edit to update: Something has gone wrong and it's only been 1 year 5 months. Hopefully it will be fixed back up under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade the WiFi card
customer_reviews.text: All stuff is great. Came in perfect condition and was well packaged. Support team was great when I asked a few questions about promotions. I suggest switching the WiFi card though, super super slow and disconnects because of the low signal. Had to upgrade my WiFi card because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic so far !!
customer_reviews.text: So far it is fantastic. The product was packaged really professionally. Everything was set up and you can plug in and enjoy. I have used it for two weeks and I haven't encountered any problem at all. The price is really competitive comparing to other manufacturers. Overall, absolutely recommended and great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine for the price. Fast and powerful, very very quiet and cool. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Paul Knight

customer_reviews.title: i have to leave positive
customer_reviews.text: Very good power gaming pc....only con no windows 10 disk?
customer_reviews.author: THFC COYS

customer_reviews.title: This is the one if your are serious.
customer_reviews.text: Desktops have come a long way since I last had one. This is the business.
customer_reviews.author: Silverman

customer_reviews.title: very good PC
customer_reviews.text: Just got my PC last Thursday and I’ve been on it since! Absolutely amazing pice of tech. Love the look of it and it was easy to instal everything. Definitely recommend this if you want to use it for gaming and program’s like Twinmotion, photoshop and other render programs.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have EVERY bought
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best thing I've ever bought. Literally nothing has disappointed my apart from that the front panel has a few dents out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Carroll

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: This pc is awesome! I haven't play pc for a long time, when i see it, i think it's so big. I haven't play it, it will see tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Qihang Shu

customer_reviews.title: How to fix the problem
customer_reviews.text: I can't get the graphic card to operate it has been stopped by Microsoft with a code43 problem
customer_reviews.author: John watt

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: VERY nicely spec'd PC. Very well built. Works like a dream straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: DAA

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my computer and good service. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Colin Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Good pc
customer_reviews.text: LED strip doesn’t turn on anymore after a week. Can’t change the colour of the fans after the front. Other than that. Works a treat, super silent and all
customer_reviews.author: Jobo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: The PC is super fast. Everything was as described. I am very happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years of using it its still in top shape. No issues at all
customer_reviews.author: Bumbac

customer_reviews.title: Received, a good built, Butt
customer_reviews.text: As it says on Product page (6x LED Fans), I only received with 3x fans.
customer_reviews.author: Usman Hameed

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, ram could of been more "premium" - my graphics card came faulty and had to spend 1500 on troubleshooting and buying a new one, other than that its alright - customer support denied my request of a refund
customer_reviews.author: Charley M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming and all round general use!
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased this for gaming! I cannot get him off it, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen stone

customer_reviews.title: Quite a big case but plenty of room to expand.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Will use it for my Train simulator.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Michael Pead

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the specs and compare it to the price... guys ..worth it !!
customer_reviews.author: Turbomeister

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pc
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase definitely not bad for a prebuilt pc
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome computer! Runs great! This machine was very easy to open the box and set up. It runs so quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Z.

customer_reviews.title: pc wont start
customer_reviews.text: it turns on but no video display and hds arent going
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic PC
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic PC! Extremely powerful and has handled anything and everything I've thrown at it so far, this includes the newest Total War releases all on ultra settings. Set up was relatively quick and easy, and the whole thing just looks great too. Would definitely recommend. If you are prepared to spend the money, you will absolutely get what you are paying for and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. ROBERTSON

customer_reviews.title: Best trade of my
customer_reviews.text: This PC is simply a masterpiece.i tried old and new games and everything runs 300+ fps on high and ultra settings.Best trade of my life
customer_reviews.author: Michal Hargas

customer_reviews.title: This PC is awesome and runs everything at max settings
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome PC, had it for 2 days now and it's ran everything I've thrown at it at max settings like a God, I really Recommend this to anyone who has this budget and is looking for a trustworthy PC, Thank you so much Cyberpower!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Jones

customer_reviews.title: Graphics Card
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the graphics card over the weekend, got in touch with costumer service, new card fitted up and running within 2 days, you cannot get better service than that 5 * Cyberpower Ultra Luxe 1080Ti Gaming PC - Intel Core i7-8700K, Nvidia GTX 1080Ti 11GB, 32GB 2400MHz RAM, Z370 Chipset, 250GB Samsung EVO 960 NVMe SSD, 1TB HDD, 600W 80+ PSU, Wifi, Liquid Cooling, Windows 10, Corsair 570X Having had it a few weeks now I must say its one fast PC, I play games at full settings np,
customer_reviews.author: Mr B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant, runs all the newest games on the highest ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant, runs all the newest games on the highest settings with nice smooth frame rate. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kieran McNiven

customer_reviews.title: Great PC so far
customer_reviews.text: Just get it today, and I would like to say that is so great. Well packaged, no damage, delivered within 5 working days. AND the most important thing is that it works so well. Highest setting in dota2 and running with 230 average FPS with 40 average cpu temp,I have a gtx 980 laptop, only 100 fps with at least 65 temp, so I am so happy with it. All fans works about 1300rpm which is quiet enough 40cm away. Although I am going to change those fan, but I would like to say the noise is acceptable for most people. Hope it will not ganna happen any problems. So far, five stars.
customer_reviews.author: ZhengBo L.

customer_reviews.title: New computer.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Does everything asked of it and is fast. Good replacement for my old PC
customer_reviews.author: j russell

customer_reviews.title: Incredible piece of equipment and done to a professional standard.
customer_reviews.text: This computer I have purchased feels like a top of the range piece of equipment; this PC runs programs incredibly fast, performs well playing games and boots up Windows quickly. The overall quality of this product in fantastic, as there has been an incredible amount of detail has gone into the construction and wiring of the hardware components.
customer_reviews.author: Callan Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: i was told its easy to fit but it may cost me 60 more ...
customer_reviews.text: Pc inside light not in correct position to ad light to front,however i contacted them an the sending second light,i was told its easy to fit but it may cost me 60 more pounds to install as i do not want to wait 8 weeks ro get it returned from cyberpower in uk so ill take to local pc store.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Review

customer_reviews.title: 100% awesome
customer_reviews.text: well packaged ,well made pc works like a charm ,instructions for install where very concise and easy to follow would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Cyberpower = quality, ready to go out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: All quality components. Ready to go out of the box. I needed a PC for my home office that was also powerful enough and future proof to handle flight simulation and music production. Once I priced up all the components to build my own, like I've done many times over the years, I found this gem all ready to go and covered by a 3 year warranty for basically the same cost. Work colleagues who bought systems from Cyberpower all had positive things to say. That was good enough for me. This system has met all my expectations and I'm very happy. Only thing I had to add was a wifi card. It's a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer - Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The first boot failed, there was a problem, especially the slow Logistics
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CyberpowerPC Luxe Gaming PC - Intel Core i7-9700KF, Nvidia RTX 2070 Super 8GB, 32GB RAM, 1TB NVMe SSD, 2TB HDD, 650W 80+ PSU, Wifi, Liquid Cooling, Windows 10, Meshify C
feature_bullets: System: Intel Core i7-9700KF Processor (8 Cores, 3.6GHz Base, 4.9Hz Turbo, 12MB Cache) | Intel Z390 Chipset Motherboard | 32GB 2400MHz DDR4 RAM | 1TB M.2 NVMe SSD | 2TB 7200RPM SATA-III HDD
Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 Super 8GB Graphics Card | Buy GeForce RTX, Get Tom Clancy's Rainbox Six Siege Gold Edition | Displayport v1.4, HDMI 2.0b | 650W 80+ Certified Gaming Power Supply
Connectivity: 6x USB 3.1 gen 1 | 2x USB 2.0 | 1x PS/2 KB or Mouse Port | 1x RJ45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | 300Mbps 802.11n Wifi | 7.1-Channel High Definition Audio
Case & Cooling: Fractal Design Meshify C TG Mid-Tower Case | 6x RGB LED Fans | 240mm All-in-one CPU Liquid Cooler
Warranty & Software: 2 Years Parts & 3 Years Labour | Lifetime Technical Support | Bullguard Internet Security 1 Year, 3 Devices | Windows 10 Home 64-bit
